Producer: Neil A. Machlis, Mike Nichols, Garry Shandling
Screenwriter: Garry Shandling, Michael Leeson, Garry Shandling, Michael Leeson, Ed Solomon, Peter Tolan
Production Co: Columbia Pictures, What Planet Are You From? Productions, Brillstein-Grey Entertainment
Synopsis: Harold is sent to Earth on a mission to impregnate a woman and have a child. Harold befriends Perry Gordon, a horny, morally challenged specimen of the human male, and together they scope Phoenix for women. On the prowl for the ideal woman with whom he can mate, the alien encounters a wide spectrum of potential candidates.
Title: What Planet Are You From?
